Package com.ibm.mobilefirstplatform.clientsdk.android.push.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MFPPushNotificationListener
    This interface defines the callback method used for receiving the notification from GCM
    MFPPushResponseListener
    This interface defines the callback methods used for reporting the status of MFPPush's async methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MFPPush
    MFPPush provides methods required by an android application to be able to receive push notifications.
    MFPPushInstanceIDListenerService
    MFPPushInstanceIDListenerService responsible for refreshing the tokens.
    MFPPushIntentService
    MFPPushIntentService responsible for handling communication from GCM (Google Cloud Messaging).
    MFPPushNotificationHandler  
    MFPSimplePushNotification  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MFPPushException
